CustomJsTracker.PluginDescription: Allows any plugin to extend the Matomo JavaScript Tracking file (matomo.js) and add new functionality and website measurement capabilities.
CustomJsTracker.DiagnosticPiwikJsNotWritable: The Matomo JavaScript tracker file %s is not writable which means other plugins cannot extend the JavaScript tracker. In the future even some core features might not work as expected.
CustomJsTracker.DiagnosticPiwikJsMakeWritable: We recommend to make %1$s writable by running this command: %2$s
